headline.main: Body Found in Luggage Near Seattle, Second Time Since May
headline.print_headline: Body Found in Luggage Near Seattle, Second Time Since May

docs.snippet: A badly decomposed body was discovered on Monday in a duffle bag near a dumpster in the city of SeaTac, Washington, the second time since May that human remains have been found stuffed into luggage in the Seattle area....
docs.lead_paragraph: A badly decomposed body was discovered on Monday in a duffle bag near a dumpster in the city of SeaTac, Washington, the second time since May that human remains have been found stuffed into luggage in the Seattle area.

headline.main: Norfolk South Profit Dented by Lower Coal and Fuel Surcharges
headline.print_headline: Norfolk South Profit Dented by Lower Coal and Fuel Surcharges

docs.snippet: U.S. railroad Norfolk Southern Corp on Monday reported a lower quarterly net profit as coal freight shipments and fuel surcharge revenue fell, and said coal would continue to weigh on results this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. railroad Norfolk Southern Corp on Monday reported a lower quarterly net profit as coal freight shipments and fuel surcharge revenue fell, and said coal would continue to weigh on results this year.

headline.main: Apple Watch Will Be Sold at Some Best Buy Stores
headline.print_headline: Apple Watch Will Be Sold at Some Best Buy Stores

docs.snippet: The Apple Watch is heading to some Best Buy stores ahead of the holiday shopping season....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Apple Watch is heading to some Best Buy stores ahead of the holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Medical Examiner Confirms Oklahoma Family Stabbed to Death
headline.print_headline: Medical Examiner Confirms Oklahoma Family Stabbed to Death

docs.snippet: A Broken Arrow couple and three of their children found dead inside their home last week all died from "multiple sharp-force injuries," the Oklahoma medical examiner's office confirmed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Broken Arrow couple and three of their children found dead inside their home last week all died from "multiple sharp-force injuries," the Oklahoma medical examiner's office confirmed on Monday.

headline.main: Texas Prosecutor Names Committee to Review Sandra Bland Case
headline.print_headline: Texas Prosecutor Names Committee to Review Sandra Bland Case

docs.snippet: A committee of outside attorneys will assist the Texas district attorney investigating the death of Sandra Bland, the black woman who authorities say hanged herself in her jail cell three days after a traffic stop by a white state trooper....
docs.lead_paragraph: A committee of outside attorneys will assist the Texas district attorney investigating the death of Sandra Bland, the black woman who authorities say hanged herself in her jail cell three days after a traffic stop by a white state trooper.

headline.main: Turkish Bombing of Kurds Carries Risk of Instability
headline.print_headline: Turkish Bombing of Kurds Carries Risk of Instability

docs.snippet: Turkey's unexpected move to launch raids against Kurdish rebels at the same time it is cracking down on the Islamic State group risks ending a period of relative calm and stability for the country that has been a boon for the economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey's unexpected move to launch raids against Kurdish rebels at the same time it is cracking down on the Islamic State group risks ending a period of relative calm and stability for the country that has been a boon for the economy.

headline.main: Fighting Between Turkey and Kurds Escalate Amid NATO Unease
headline.print_headline: Fighting Between Turkey and Kurds Escalate Amid NATO Unease

docs.snippet: Fighting between the Turkish military and Kurdish rebels escalated Tuesday amid signs of unease from NATO allies attending an emergency meeting about Turkey's conflicts with the Islamic State group and the Kurds....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fighting between the Turkish military and Kurdish rebels escalated Tuesday amid signs of unease from NATO allies attending an emergency meeting about Turkey's conflicts with the Islamic State group and the Kurds.

headline.main: Greece's Varoufakis Confirms Covert Plan to Hack Tax Codes
headline.print_headline: Greece's Varoufakis Confirms Covert Plan to Hack Tax Codes

docs.snippet: Former Greek Finance Minister Yanis Varoufakis confirmed on Monday he had made secret preparations to hack into citizens' tax codes to create a parallel payment system after the disclosure provoked shock and disbelief in Greece....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Greek Finance Minister Yanis Varoufakis confirmed on Monday he had made secret preparations to hack into citizens' tax codes to create a parallel payment system after the disclosure provoked shock and disbelief in Greece.

headline.main: Taxi Laws Need Post-Uber Rethink, French Economy Minister Says
headline.print_headline: Taxi Laws Need Post-Uber Rethink, French Economy Minister Says

docs.snippet: Taxi legislation needs to adapt to the arrival of online ride-hailing services like Uber, France's Economy Minister Emmanuel Macron said on Monday as he convened talks to address the controversial issue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Taxi legislation needs to adapt to the arrival of online ride-hailing services like Uber, France's Economy Minister Emmanuel Macron said on Monday as he convened talks to address the controversial issue.

headline.main: Yemenis describe "total destruction" after air strike
headline.sub: Yemenis describe "total destruction" after air strike

docs.snippet: Saudi-led air strikes over the weekend have reportedly killed as many as 80 people in Yemeni city of Taiz. Sean Carberry reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi-led air strikes over the weekend have reportedly killed as many as 80 people in Yemeni city of Taiz. Sean Carberry reports.
